title: Deconstructing Complexity
text:
Welcome to the Decision Science Lab.
In modern enterprise, data is abundant but certainty is scarce. This Lab documents my work in bridging that gap.
I specialize in deconstructing complex systemsâ€”where variables are noisy and causality is hiddenâ€”and architecting the decision frameworks needed to solve them reliably.
